resources.string: Grave digger is a single player game. When player clicked on a slot with zombies, zombies will be revealed. When there is no zombie in the slot. It will trigger a scan. The game strategy is trying to use the least amount of scan to find all zombies. Players can select different size of the grid and the number of zombies. Which makes the game more playable.

Zombie: https://www.pinclipart.com/pindetail/owxwRJ_pvz2-zombiemummy3x-plants-vs-zombies-zombie-face-clipart 
Tomb: https://www.pngitem.com/middle/mhmhTJ_transparent-rip-gravestone-png-plants-vs-zombie-tomb
